titles.title: I See You As Perfect; I See You As Holy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I see you as perfect; I see you as holy
I see you through the eyes of the Spirit of God
I see you as the Father sees.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I see my brother as perfect; I see my brother as holy
I see my brother through the eyes of the Spirit of God
I see my brother as the Father sees.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I see my sister as perfect; I see my sister as holy
I see my sister through the eyes of the Spirit of God
I see my sister as the Father sees.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
